refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para:
This manual page describes the configuration of RADIUS domains for
sssd 8 . Refer to the FILE FORMAT section of the
sssd.conf 5 manual page for detailed syntax information.
You can configure SSSD to use more than one RADIUS domain.
RADIUS back end supports only auth provider. Id_provider must be set to use the same user database as RADIUS server.

refsect1.title: CONFIGURATION OPTIONS
refsect1.para:
All of the common configuration options that apply to SSSD domains also apply to RADIUS domains. Refer to the DOMAIN SECTIONS section of the
sssd.conf 5 manual page for full details.

Every RADIUS domain have to include specification of RADIUS server in rad_server and shared secret in rad_secret.
rad_server (string)
Specifies the server which should be used for RADIUS authentication. This option is compulsory for rad provider.
Can be defined either by IP, hostname or even by socket path.
For explicit IPv6 addresses, <host> must be enclosed in brackets []
rad_port (string)
Specifies port on which is server listening.
Can be set by port number, or by name of service (from /etc/services).
Default: radius
rad_secret (string)
Shared secret between host and server. This have to be the same in the server configuration, or authentication requests will be discarded.
rad_timeout (integer)
Sets timeout for single response from server in mikroseconds. If server does not reply in time, duplicate request is sent.
Default: 10000
rad_conn_retries (integer)
Specifies number of connection retries. Provider sends up to this number requests and if it doesnâ€™t get any reply, authentication is rejected.
Default: 3
rad_identifier (string)
Specifies an identification of this host that should be sent to server as NAS-Identifier.
Default: hostname of client

refsect1.title: EXAMPLE
refsect1.para: The following example assumes that SSSD is correctly configured and RADIUS is set to one of the domains in the [domains] section.

para.programlisting:
[domain/RADIUS] id_provider = ldap ldap_uri = ldap://ldap.mydomain.org ldap_search_base = dc=mydomain,dc=org
auth_provider = rad rad_server = radius.mydomain.org rad_secret = mysharedsecret
